EDUCATION.Institute Name: Our Lady of Fatima Convent High School

LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Microsoft Professional Program in Data Science

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
	Project Description: Mobile suite is a pack of Enterprise Mobile solutions and utility mobile Apps. 
Platforms: Android, iPhone, Win7 mobile OS.
Following are the Mobile solutions part of the same:-
1)	Mobile FSM (Field Service Mobility) – An enterprise mobile App which will provide support to Field technicians by providing Diagnostic Help, Manuals, Training videos in 8 different languages and also order part replacement and check status/ history for previous part orders.
2)	Mobile QR codes catalogue – A mobile web-site which displays product details, product video, product review when user scans QR code and also provides back-end report to Dell for QR Scan Impressions, Conversion Rates for calls and Video Traffic.
a.	There was a QR code Admin portal for making new QR codes keeping in sync with  Dell’s Product line and ensuring sanctity of business rules which defined & differentiated individual business units 
3)	Mobile Launchpad – An application which will serve as a directory for all available applications and websites under Dell mobile space within various categories like shop, media, chat, support.
4)	Mobile AccuTimer – A mobile App which provides user with Stopwatch & Timer functionality and allows them to customize them.
	Responsibilities: Business Analyst/ Project Manager
	Requirement gathering.
	Participated in Project Estimation.
	Leading the Dev., QA & UI team.
	Managing communication by creating weekly status reports and discussing with stakeholders.
	Pursued requirements validation and final sign-off from client.
	Coaching, mentoring & managing project team.
	Approvals from e-Dell PMO, Dell Legal team & Dell Brand team.
